param.name: includefullspecies
param.displayname: Do you want to process the full species too?

tool.summary:
Add data to the map for the selected infraspecies.

Optionally, you can add the data for the full species to the map in a separate group.

Optionally, you can display the output data with the French species names (if they exist).
